item.title: Notes about Raft's paper
item.author: Pierre Zemb
item.description: Notes About is a blogpost serie you will find a lot of links, videos, quotes, podcasts to click on about a specific topic. Today we will discover Raft’s paper called ‘In Search of an Understandable Consensus Algorithm’. As I’m digging into ETCD, I needed to refresh my memory about Raft. I started by reading the paper located here and I’m also playing with the amazing Raft labs made by PingCAP.
